title: Can someone help me identify the fonts in this logo?
content:
Need help with the "Good Ride" font

[http://goodrideauto.com/images/logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804145547/http:/goodrideauto.com/images/logo.jpg "http://goodrideauto.com/images/logo.jpg")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804145547/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_116.jpg) | 27.6 KB |
author: flophouse85

comments.content: you can use the web page [http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804145547/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/ "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/")
No mistake. It's tesh48 that's sorry.
